subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Sean Morey blocked Mat McBriar’s punt and Monty Beisel scooped up the ball and scored from 3 yards to give the Cardinals a victory over the Cowboys on Sunday.
snippet: Sean Morey blocked Mat McBriar’s punt and Monty Beisel scooped up the ball and scored from 3 yards to give the Cardinals a victory over the Cowboys on Sunday.
